mt:Texts.mt:Texts: Lastly, we will go over flying in MRET.
Go to the locomotion section of the menu once more, and select the "flying" button. Remember to turn off walking!
You use your hands (controllers) and trigger buttons to fly.
Aim at something in the distance, press the trigger button, and pull yourself towards the object.
Try aiming and pulling yourself towards the blue orbs to fly across the room!
